config.bin.description:
File Replacer Path

DISC0 - Loads files from disc0:/FUC/nativePSP/ (ISO).
MS0 - Loads files from ms0:/FUC/nativePSP/ (Memory Stick).

Save Region

ULJM05500 - Load Japanese Portable 2nd G saves.
ULUS10391 - Load North American Freedom Unite saves.
ULES00123 - Load European Freedom Unite saves.

True Raw/Ele/Status Display

When enabled, removes the 'bloat' modifiers on weapons to display the true raw,
element and status.

Dos Audio

When enabled, replaces Jungle, Desert, Swamp, Snowy Mountain, Volcano and Tower
battle themes with their Monster Hunter Dos counterparts.

Field of View

Default - Uses the default FoV value of 0.872
Minor - Sets the FoV value to 0.935
Moderate - Sets the FoV value to 0.997
Extreme - Sets the FoV value to 1.120

Starting Vertical Camera Position

Sets the starting vertical position when starting a quest.

1 - Lowest, pointing towards the ground.
2 - Second from lowest.
3 - Centered.
4 - Default.
5 - Highest, pointing towards the sky.

Minimap Size

Sets the minimap size/scale. If you set to either 75% or 50%, loading screen between
areas is also scaled down.

Default - Original size (100%)
75% - Minimap scaled to 75%
50% - Minimap scaled to 50%

Hunting Horn Tweak

When enabled, applies various hunting horn tweaks to notes and motion values.

• Notes only disappear when the player is staggered/tripped/stunned (roared, paralyzed,
knockback, wind pressured, etc) or sheathes their weapon
• The hilt jab poke attack now does cutting damage and the motion value was reduced
from 12 impact to 10 cutting.
